title: Synapses
content: My typeface is based on the neurological aspects of sleep/dreams and the stages that appear during sleep. Any comments would be much appreciated.
author: carrie

comments.content: Hi Carrie, welcome to Typophile. I think your ampersand could use some work. However, I do like your quotation marks.
Wow, that Edward Gorey stuff is creepy, and it makes this typeface look even more creepy than it already did. Interesting spin on dreamlike states

Woah. Very interesting. I see [Edward Gorey](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017033602/http:/www.geocities.com/SunsetStrip/Stage/7535/gorey.html), but this says a lot about me. I'd like to see this one larger too. What if you reversed the scale on the ampersand?
